deals.description: Get up to 50% off coats and jackets, then use the code MHWSPR65 during checkout for an extra discount on your order at Mountain Hardwear. Shipping is free when you sign up for free for an Elevated Rewards membership, otherwise it adds $6. The promotion includes this men's Dynotherm Down Jacket, which listed at $200 and was already on sale for $99.98. It falls to $69.99 with the code. This women's Solamere Jacket falls from $100 to $64.98 to $32.49. These are the best prices we can find anywhere, and there are many styles to choose from. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Mountain Hardwear
deals.title: Mountain Hardwear: Up to 65% Off Jackets

deals.description: This women's Eddie Bauer Selene Jacket drops from $129 to $49.99 to $29.99 when you enter the code FAMILY40 at checkout at EddieBauer.com. This ties with the lowest price we've seen to date on this jacket. It is 100% nylon and features insulation at the chest and back. Shipping adds $7.99 or is free on orders over $99. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Eddie Bauer
deals.title: Eddie Bauer Women's Selene Jacket $30

deals.description: This men's Spyder Foremost Full Zip Stryke Jacket goes from $169 to $74.99 to $71.24 when you enter our exclusive coupon BD5SPYDER during checkout at MountainSteals.com. Plus shipping is free. We couldn't find this jacket anywhere else for less. It comes in sizes XS-3XL in up to five colors while supplies last and features a brushed microfiber collar lining. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Mountain Steals
deals.title: Spyder Men's Jacket $71 Shipped

deals.description: This men's MicroTherm Down Flux Jacket drops from $149 to $79.99 to $47.99 when you enter the coupon code FAMILY40 at checkout at EddieBauer.com. This ties with the lowest price we've seen to date on this jacket. It is available in two color choices, features 800 down fill, and has a athletic fit. Shipping adds $7.99 or is free on orders over $99. Sales tax is charged in most states.

deals.title: Eddie Bauer Men's Down Flux Jacket $48

deals.description: Originally $120, this women's Columbia Dry Spell Jacket drops to $60 when you apply code CSPRING17 at checkout at Columbia.com. Shipping is free when you sign up for Greater Rewards, which is free to join. This is the best price online by $57. Choose from two colors in sizes XS-XL (as of 4/13). This jacket is waterproof, breathable, and seam sealed. It has an attached storm hood, zippered hand pockets, and a drop tail. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Columbia Sportswear
deals.title: Columbia Dry Spell Jacket $60 Shipped

deals.description: This men's Calvin Klein Faux Leather Moto Jacket, which lists for $198, drops from $49.99 to $34.99 when you apply code FRIEND at checkout at Macys.com. Get free shipping by adding a beauty item to your cart such as $4 Burt's Bees Lip Balm. This is the best price we could find by $40! Sizes S-2XL are available. This jacket is faux leather, and it has two side pockets and an asymmetrical zip closure. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Macy's
deals.title: Calvin Klein Asymmetric Moto Jacket $35

deals.description: The North Face Women's Apex Bionic Soft-Shell Jacket, originally $149, drops about 40% to $89.99 at Macys.com for a limited time. Shipping is free. All sizes of the Balsam Green Heather (pictured at right) remain available, as do XS through Medium in the Shady Blue or S in Black. Of note if you are a size small: Moosejaw.com has this same jacket in five various shades or purple, pink or green for under $72, $77 or $79 depending on the color but only size small is availabe.

And check out the Kenneth Cole New York Extreme Slim-Fit Jacket, once $400, now dropping from $49.99 to $34.99 with the same code. Shipping is free if you spend $99 or add a beauty item to your order, otherwise it starts at $9.95. Sales tax is charged in most states.

The promotion includes these men's Reebok Royal Lumina Shoes, which listed at $49.99 and were on sale for $39.97. They drop to $23.98 with the code. Some sizes will sell out quickly, but there are many styles to choose from for men, women, and children. Sales tax is charged in most states.

deals.description: Get up to 49% off men's clearance clothes, then take an extra 30% off select items when you use the code FRIEND during checkout at Macys.com. Shipping is free on orders over $99 or when you add a beauty item such as this lip balm to your cart, otherwise it starts at $9.95. The promotion includes this Guess Trucker Jacket, which listed at $250 and was on sale for $112.99. You can get it for $79.09 with the code. This big and tall Cutter & Buck Mercerized Midvale Striped Polo was already on sale for $29.99. It drops to $20.99 with the extra discount. The pictured Alfani Warren Textured Shirt falls from $49.50 to $28.99 to $20.29. These are the best prices we can find anywhere. Some sizes may sell out quickly, but there are more than 4,500 styles to choose from in the clearance section. Sales tax is charged in most states.
